name: Keyframes
storyline:
Bumble headfirst into the last two weeks of your second Spring Semester. With an ensemble cast of five, you'll find yourself in silly situations, entertaining impulse decisions, and forging new friendships— or maybe even romance?

Keyframes is an amare visual novel that begins during the player’s second year of college. At a barbecue hosted by your student body president, you meet Percy, Elio, and Jamie— three friends with enough eccentricities and good humor between them to be the leading cast of a sitcom. Be it by chance or by the decisions you make, the three of them become as much a part of your life as you do theirs.
summary: Between exams, friendships, and figuring out what a savings account is, college might just be one of the busiest times of your life. No one said adulthood was going to be easy, but it’ll be a little less painful to navigate with your two best friends by your side... and three new chance acquaintances, who happen to be the right people at the right time.
